attributes.action: Halt refugee migration into EU and ensure UN takes responsibility locally.
attributes.background: Refugee migration is a world issue and should be supported in a more professional manner. The UN must support refugees nearest to their country of origin as reflected in their charter. Funds could then be spent more effectively assisting far more people avoiding the chaos and deaths

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be asking for the EU and/or the UN to take action. 

You could start a petition asking for the UK Government to press for the action you want to see at EU or UN level.
